text:
server.xml contains:

      <!-- Define the default virtual host -->
      <Host name="localhost" debug="0" appBase="webapps" unpackWARs="true">

$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/webapps
$ ls
ROOT.war  examples.war  manager.war  webdav.war

$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/bin
$ catalina.sh run

Starting service Tomcat-Standalone
Apache Tomcat/4.0-b6-dev

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Document base 
$CATALINA_HOME/webapps/examples does not exist or is not a readable directory

Ok, I did this:

$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/webapps
$ mkdir examples
$ ls
ROOT.war  examples  examples.war  manager.war  webdav.war
$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/bin
$ catalina.sh run
Starting service Tomcat-Standalone
Apache Tomcat/4.0-b6-dev
Starting service Tomcat-Apache
Apache Tomcat/4.0-b6-dev

$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/webapps
$ ls
ROOT      examples      manager      webdav
ROOT.war  examples.war  manager.war  webdav.war

It unpacked ROOT, manager and webdav, but lets see what is in examples

$ cd $CATALINA_HOME/webapps/examples
$ ls

Nothing. Because the bootup requires the examples directory to exits, it never
unpacks the .war file.
creator: tanner@real-time.com
tanner@real-time.com

text:
The configuration file implies that the "examples" context is already unpacked 
(so that's why it's failing if no directory exists).
